meanings.definition: A type of Indian fried snack made with vegetables or meat coated in chickpea flour.
meanings.sent1: I love to eat pakoras with my friends during our picnics.
meanings.sent2: My mom makes delicious pakoras for us every weekend.
meanings.sent3: The pakoras at the party disappeared in seconds!
meanings.sent4: Her cooking skills turned the simple pakoras into a gourmet delight.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly fried pakoras filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: The act of frying vegetables or meat coated in chickpea flour to make a snack.
meanings.sent1: Making pakoras is a fun activity for the whole family.
meanings.sent2: The chef's specialty is the perfect pakoras every time.
meanings.sent3: He performed a magic trick with the sizzling pakoras.
meanings.sent4: The sizzle of the hot oil as it cooked the pakoras was music to her ears.
meanings.sent5: The golden brown color of the pakoras indicated they were ready to eat.
